scripts.test: firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,functions 'npm run _init && npx --node-arg=--experimental-vm-modules jest --verbose'

--experimental-vm-modules: Needed for now (Aug 2020), to use native ES6 modules with Jest
jest-environment-node: Needed for native ES6 modules. NOT SURE what it really is, but it comes from Jest repo and is told to be required.

start: Must use 'firebase emulators:start' so that the Emulators UI shows the data. This causes 'concurrently'
and 'wait-on' to be needed, as dependencies.
